QuestData.Title: Becoming the Hunt
QuestData.Description:
<Reldorn grins at you.>
He knew you'd be back! The Horned Hunter went on ahead to prepare the hunting ground. He said you should join him as soon as you can.
Now that you have the materials for the trap, you just need to reach him...
It's dangerous territory to traverse, but I've been devising a glamour that should help you avoid the attention of the roaming beasts. Maybe if it's useful, you could put in a good word for...
Ahem. Anyway, we should focus on your quarry. Good hunting, friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Huln Highmountain within the Elder Stand.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Huln Highmountain within Tirna Scithe.
QuestData.RewardText: You are just in time. My preparations are nearly complete.
